faqData.question: How can ERP help my metal fabrication business?
faqData.answer: ERP brings all your key processes into one system. It helps manage quotes, inventory, production and delivery — making your work faster, more accurate and easier to track.

faqData.question: Can ERP handle custom jobs and one-off orders?
faqData.answer: Yes, a well-designed ERP system can handle custom BOMs, organize job-specific tasks, and schedule production efficiently—tailored to each unique order.

faqData.question: Will ERP work with my CAD or CAM software?
faqData.answer: Most modern ERP systems offer integrations with CAD/CAM tools. This helps your designs flow directly into production without manual work.
